thread.title: Corinthia Hotel London wins multiple awards
thread.title_full: Corinthia Hotel London wins multiple awards

author: eTN Editor
title: Corinthia Hotel London wins multiple awards
text:
AA Hotel of the Year London 2015-2016, Inspector’s Choice and Red Star Award 2015-2016 Corinthia Hotel London wins multiple awards   
Oct 08, 2015 Fiona Bruce, Mirko Cattini, Thomas M. Fischer, Steve Barker, and Simon Numphud eTN   
LONDON, England - Corinthia Hotel London is delighted to receive the AA Hotel of the Year London 2015-2016, and Inspectors’ Choice & Red Star Award 2015-2016 as awarded at last night’s AA Hospitality Awards by celebrity newscaster Fiona Bruce. These awards are the AA’s ultimate accolades for hotels in the UK. 
The AA awards are one of the most prestigious national awards for the hospitality sector. Winners are chosen through a rigorous judging process that draws on the unrivaled knowledge and expertise of the AA inspectorate and other industry professionals. The event is attended by world-renowned chefs, prominent hoteliers and restaurateurs, hospitality gurus and key media. 
Corinthia London opened in April 2011 as the flagship hotel for Corinthia Hotels International. The hotel has become known for its quality service and 21st century approach. 
Thomas M. Fischer, General Manager of Corinthia London says: “We are immensely proud to have won these two awards and to have been recognized as an outstanding hotel in this highly competitive London market. The team deliver the highest service on a daily basis and we are delighted to have received this award.”
